Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.vc

Verifiable Credentials implementation on top of Hedera HCS DID method.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CredentialSubject  
    HcsVcDocumentBase<T extends CredentialSubject>
    The base for a VC document generation in JSON-LD format.
    HcsVcDocumentJsonProperties
    Key property names in VC document standard.
    HcsVcMessage
    The Verifiable Credential message.
    HcsVcStatusResolver
    Resolves the VC status from Hedera network.
    HcsVcTopicListener
    A listener of confirmed HcsVcMessage messages from a VC topic.
    HcsVcTransaction
    The DID document creation, update or deletion transaction.
    Issuer  
    IssuerTypeAdapterFactory  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HcsVcOperation
    The operation type to be performed on the DID document.

Verifiable Credentials implementation on top of Hedera HCS DID method.
